messages.title: FOCUS ON HALTON
messages.content: Frank Harasiwka believes in delivering fairness, not just talking about it.

messages.title: LABOUR HAS LET YOU AND HALTON DOWN!
messages.content: The many people that Frank has met in Halton agree that they have been badly let down by Labour and its local MP. Gordon Brown knows that and tells us NOW that he's in favour of fairness.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase tax allowances to £10,000 per person. That will mean £700 less tax paid per year for every person in Halton. Paid for by charging the rich more!
Provide a pupil premium of £2,500 for each child from the most deprived areas to help them have a fair chance at having a decent education.
Guarantee a week’s respite care for the hundreds of carers in Halton who look after family or friends, so they can rest, recuperate or take a break.
Give the right to local voters to sack their MP if he/she betrays their trust.

issues.education: Provide a pupil premium of £2,500 for each child from the most deprived areas to help them have a fair chance at having a decent education.
issues.governance: Give the right to local voters to sack their MP if he/she betrays their trust.
issues.health: Guarantee a week’s respite care for the hundreds of carers in Halton.

leaflet.personalStatement: Frank Harasiwka - Ready To Help YOU! If you have any issues that you feel Frank can help you with or have anything you want to talk about, you can contact him at: franklibdem@hotmail.co.uk or call

politicalExperience.role: Local Lib Dems representative chosen to fight Halton seat
politicalExperience.duration: over two years in the constituency
politicalExperience.achievements: Worked as Chief Operating Officer for a locally based company.

images.caption: LOCAL LIB DEMS CHOOSE FRANK TO FIGHT HALTON
Frank Harasiwka with West MEP Chris Davies.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Check out how Labour’s claim to fairness has hurt thousands of Halton residents—Overleaf
